Posts.EditableText:
I have a chest that needs a key to be unlocked. Problem is that it does not matter whether I have the key or not, it can be unlocked.
Attached is an example.

I will be thankful for any help in this regard.
Posts.HTML:
I have a chest that needs a key to be unlocked. Problem is that it does not matter whether I have the key or not, it can be unlocked.

Posts.EditableText: This is a bug which is solved for the next version. Just add a second key in the gui and use the same key
Posts.HTML: This is a bug which is solved for the next version. Just add a second key in the gui and use the same key

Posts.EditableText: Thank you Pertex. It works a treat.
Posts.HTML: Thank you Pertex. It works a treat.
